img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with a large, muscular enemy. The enemy is labeled as "Black Wind King," and there is a health bar indicating its remaining health. The environment appears to be a forested area with leaves on the ground. The player character is performing an attack, as evidenced by the dynamic motion and visual effects surrounding them. Various icons are displayed on the screen, suggesting available abilities or items for the player to use during the battle.
